issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Launch the Blackberry 10 & 10.1 Beta simulators on win 7 & win 8
2.Notice the total startup time

Actual Result:
1.The BB 10 & BB 10.1 beta simulators take a long time to start as compared to mac osx which is very quick

Expected Result:
1.The BB 10 & BB 10.1 simulators should startup quickly as in case of mac osx
fields.summary: Blackberry 10 & 10.1 Beta : The Blackberry 10 & 10.1 beta simulators take a long time to start on windows
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201302061750
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130206165546
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 64 bit
Win 8 
BB simulator : 10.0.9.386
BB simulator : 10.1.0.338

comments.body: This is a performance issue with the VMWare image which is authored by BlackBerry.
Closing ticket as this is not our bug.
